info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 1:13PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A thunderstorm producing very heavy rainfall will impact portions of north central Warren, south central Rock Island, Mercer and southwestern Henry Counties through 215 PM CDT... At 110 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a thunderstorm capable of producing torriential rain over Millersburg, or near Aledo, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and very heavy rain. This storm will be capable of producing a very quick 1 to 2 inches of rain as it passes. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Aledo, Burgess, Viola, Millersburg, Matherville, Reynolds, Joy, Seaton, Hamlet, Shale City, New Windsor, Boden, Mannon, Edgington, Aledo Mercer County Airport, Wanlock, Gingle Corners, Gilchrist, Sunbeam and Old Gilchrist. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Report any unsual water issues to your local law enforecment, they will relay your report to the National Weather Service.
